Name: Clicker: Mining Simulator
About the game: This game is a clicker in which you will have an exciting immersion in the world of mining. You are waiting for five different locations in which you will be engaged in the production of cryptocurrency, track the rates for its profitable sale, purchase equipment to improve your enterprise are waiting for you. Features: - Clicker - Steam achievements - Nice graphic and music - Endless gameplay - Five different currencies - Five different locations - Choice of equipment - This game was created using Clickteam Fusion 2.5
